data.text:
Collega Mirza was very helpful and friendly ! 
The rooms were always very clean.
The room cleaning was reliable and quick.
the breakfast was very balanced and varied.
The service at the reception as in the entire hotel is very friendly.
Thank you very much for the lovely time and we would be happy to recommend you to others.
data.title: Stay was good !

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear ewelinf2021,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us! We're thrilled to hear that your stay with us was enjoyable and that Mirza made a positive impression with their helpful and friendly demeanor.

Maintaining cleanliness and providing efficient room service are top priorities for us, so we're delighted that you found our room cleaning reliable and quick. It's also wonderful to know that you appreciated the variety and balance of our breakfast offerings.

Your kind words about our reception and overall hotel service mean a lot to us. We strive to create a welcoming and hospitable environment for all our guests, and it's rewarding to hear that our efforts are noticed and appreciated.

Thank you once again for choosing to stay with us. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Warm regards,

Mouch√©
owner_response.author: Mouche Scheepers

data.text: The beds and pillows are the best, i never slept so good in a hotel, the people who work there are also sooo nice! Thankyou oumaima for your great service. The food is also nice! Everything is super clean and if you need something they will help you directly.
data.title: Great service

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 31inayae,

Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed great service during your stay and that our beds and pillows provided you with the best sleep ever experienced in a hotel.

We are delighted that you found our team to be exceptionally friendly, and we'll be sure to pass along your appreciation to Oumaima for her outstanding service.

We look forward to welcoming you back for another wonderful stay in the future.

Warm Regards,

Mouch√© Scheepers

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Q8195EMrichardm,

Thank you for taking the time to share your positive feedback with us! We're delighted to hear that you had a great experience during your stay at our hotel.

We're glad to know that you found our hotel to be of good quality and that you were especially satisfied with the service provided by our staff, including Salindha for cleaning your room, our helpful reception team, and the attentive breakfast staff. It's wonderful to hear that our team members made a positive impression on you and contributed to making your stay enjoyable.

We're also pleased that you appreciated our valet parking service and found it to be quick and efficient.

Your kind words serve as motivation for us to continue providing excellent service to all our guests. We look forward to welcoming you back for another enjoyable stay in the future. 

Regards,
